channel.title: Music – BLACK SABBATH
channel.description: Recent content in BLACK SABBATH on Music

item.title: BLACK SABBATH - Changes
item.description:
작곡: Ward, Iommi, Butler / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8810 / TJ: 20956

I feel unhappy
I feel so sad
I’ve lost
the best friend
That I ever had
she was my woman
I love her so
but it’s too
Late now
I’ve let her go
I’m going through
changes
I’m going through
changes-

We shared the years
we shared each day
In love together
we found a way
But soon the world
had its evil way
My heart was blinded
love went astray
I’m going through
changes
I’m going through
changes-

It tooks so long
to realize
And I can still hear
her last goodbyes
Now all my days
are filled with tears
Wish I could go back
and change these years
I’m going through
changes
I’m going through
changes-
